https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sA7jgsgoYef2wYfXuc6B4tDR1um.jpg The unique Bennett-Song family learns the true meaning of the holidays as they solve a community crisis and adapt to big changes. Everything you want in a holiday film: love, the power of belief, laughter, tears, and new musical classics. A Bennett Song Holiday
